add.title: Add policy
add.text: To add a policy choose the secrets, contacts and fill in the necessary information.

delete.title: Delete policy
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the policy '{{policy}}'?

edit.title: Edit policy
edit.text: Edit your policies name, secrets and contacts.

add.title: Add contact
add.text: To add a new contact enter the id of it and extend it with a known name.

delete.title: Delete contact
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the contact '{{contact}}'?

edit.title: Edit contact
edit.text: Update the information of your contact.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.text: It seems you have not yet created your IOLO account. You wanna go for one?

conditions.max-logout-time: Max. time in days where you haven't been logged in to IOLO

add.title: Add secret
add.text: To add a new secret choose the category of it and fill in the necessary information.

delete.title: Delete secret
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the secret {{secret}}?

share.title: Share your ID
share.info: Sharing this QR code allows a person to register you as a contact.
